# Vocab Study CLI

A simple CLI tool to help language learners study vocabulary by providing definitions via the Claude.ai API.

## Usage

```bash
vocab [word]
```

## Examples:
vocab apple
vocab "a piece of cake"
vocab "感謝"

## .env
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
OPENAI_API_KEY
GOOGLE_API_KEY
GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS
MEDIA_PATH=
